note:
Samantak Ghosh, correct pronunciation: Shawmontalk.
Oldest Samantak on this planet.

- jacK of alL tradeS, MasteR of feW.

Sports enthusiast turned tech-savvy. Former cricketer, footballer, basketball player, badminton player, a table-tennis player sometimes chess. Now, a computer engineer specializing in UI/UX design (work) and a passionate guitarist.

Always pushing my limits and never settling for mediocrity. Striving to bring the same energy and creativity to my life and career goals.
